item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-17
item.description: Wikipedia wants to charge Google, Amazon, and Apple for using its content (3 minute read) The Wikimedia Foundation behind Wikipedia has created a new division called Wikimedia Enterprise, which will provide commercial products that tailor Wikipedia’s content for publication on services provided by Big Tech companies.
